rows.name: Development Experience and Knowledge
cells: Several years of industry experience, participated in several successful projects. Able to guide and coordinate a development team of 5-7 people
At least 3 years of leadership experience in a software development organization. Able to run an organization of 10-30 people. Project management experience is a must.
At least 5 years of experience as organization unit leader, able to run an organization of 30-100 people. Experienced project and multi-project / Program manager
Able to run a business organization. Proven track record of project and program management, as well as organization unit management
Able to run a large business organization. Proven track record of project and program management, as well as organization unit management

rows.name: Software Process Knowledge
cells: Expected to be able to follow and enhance a defined software development process and enforce it on a project
Expected to be able to follow and actively enhance a defined software development process and enforce it on a project

rows.name: Reliability
cells:
Expected to work independently with strong management supervision.

Expected to have proven experience in evaluating theoretical knowledge and practical (on-the-job) skills and the seniority level of candidates and providing actionable feedback and recommendations on positions/projects matching.
